channel.title: The Fire Pit
channel.description: Hello Using Windows 10 and the game is giving AI inactive error message in the pit area. Creature does not move and after turning on the fire jet to destroy the creature i go down the pit and can go no further. Door at bottom will not Open. So i assume we cannot finish the game Running software on Windows 10 Pro version 10586.36 AMD motherboard with 6 core AMD cpu and R7 graphics card with latest drivers 7 hours worth of play for 15 Quid sterling

item.title: The Fire Pit
item.dc:creator: PaulShent
item.description:
Hello
Using Windows 10 and the game is giving AI inactive error message in the pit area. Creature does not move and after turning on the fire jet to destroy the creature i go down the pit and can go no further. Door at bottom will not Open.
So i assume we cannot finish the game
Running software on Windows 10 Pro version 10586.36 AMD motherboard with 6 core AMD cpu and R7 graphics card with latest drivers
7 hours worth of play for 15 Quid sterling

Read full topic
